name: SERENGETI BUILDERS POST GRID – SPG
author: Serengeti Builders Inc.

sections.description:
Serengeti builders post grid offers limitless and full control of how you want your
grids to appear, such as background colors, styles and so on.
also you can easily specify how you want your grids to open ( on default
post url, or custom url)

Support

we provide free full support of the plugin; in case of anything pls contact us at rob4lunar@gmail.com

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
1. Upload/Install plugin via wp plugin dashboard
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Serengeti grid will will appear on left wp menu, click on setting
  4. Add new grid
  5. go to grid list and customize your grid (how should appear & which post category to display)
sections.faq:
Is serengeti builders grid free?

Yes indeed its free.
sections.changelog:
1.4

more styles

1.2

additional of three different grid style, also setting for font color, family & size

1.1

additional of more styles

1.0

first stable release.
